env

Source: base/pkg/kusion_models/kube/frontend/container/env/env.k

Schema Envâ€‹

Env represents an environment variable present in a Container.

Attributesâ€‹

Name and DescriptionTypeDefault ValueRequired
name
A Container-level attribute.
The env name. This must be a C_IDENTIFIER.		strUndefinedrequired
value
A Container-level attribute.
The simple literal value.		strUndefinedoptional
valueFrom
A Container-level attribute.
The ref source of this env.		EnvValueFromUndefinedoptional

Schema EnvValueFromâ€‹

EnvValueFrom represents the source of the value of an Env.

Attributesâ€‹

Name and DescriptionTypeDefault ValueRequired
fieldRef
A Container-level attribute.
Selects a key of a field.		ObjectFieldSelectorUndefinedoptional
configMapKeyRef
A Container-level attribute.
Selects a key of a ConfigMap.		ObjectKeySelectorUndefinedoptional
secretKeyRef
A Container-level attribute.
Selects a key of a secret.		ObjectKeySelectorUndefinedoptional

Schema ObjectKeySelectorâ€‹

ObjectKeySelector contains enough information to let you locate the referenced object.

Attributesâ€‹

Name and DescriptionTypeDefault ValueRequired
name
A Container-level attribute.
The name of object, typically a ConfigMap or Secret name.		strUndefinedrequired
key
A Container-level attribute.
The key of the object to select from.		strUndefinedrequired

Schema ObjectFieldSelectorâ€‹

ObjectFieldSelector contains enough information to let you select field of an object.

Attributesâ€‹

Name and DescriptionTypeDefault ValueRequired
apiVersion
A Container-level attribute.
Version of the schema the FieldPath is written in terms of.		strUndefinedrequired
fieldPath
A Container-level attribute.
Path of the field to select of an object.		strUndefinedrequired

Schema EnvFromSourceâ€‹

EnvFromSource represents the source of a set of ConfigMaps or Secrets.

Attributesâ€‹

Name and DescriptionTypeDefault ValueRequired
configMapRef
A Container-level attribute.
The ConfigMap name to select from.		strUndefinedoptional
secretRef
A Container-level attribute.
The Secret name to select from.		strUndefinedoptional
